comment:
>>38641521

> [[ Ancient Cathedral // PVP Disabled ]]

“Split between our four allegiances and subdivide further?” You ask. The ten of you make your way up the steps in formation. You're not sure what class Vyx is, as she looks unarmed, and is hanging sort of in the middle of the group. Right now, what's on your mind, though, is ensuring the loot is divided fairly. You need more Celestial Gems. “There's five of just us. That's not exactly in our favor.”

“Isn't that the price you pay for your individual status?” Kainzo shrugs. “We—at least, the Gurdians—share a portion of what we earn with the members of our guild. If you're suggesting we profit more than you as individuals...”

“Nah.” Nel folds his arms. “Keep feeding Celestial Gems to your leader, like she tells you to.”

“Nel...” Ayla says, attempting to cut him off. “I'm sorry, Kainzo, he means—”

“No, no! It's part of being in the Alliance. You've got to give.” Nel says. “Soon Liza will be flying all around Averron while you can't even get a Celestial Artifact for yourself.”

“You're right. Issue is, I don't need to.” Kainzo says, unamused. “I already have one.”

> [[ Continued ]]
name: Sylvetica
